title: Can't finish creating PBE account.
body: Hello riot, i receive an email saying i was approve for pbe recently but it wont let me continue onto step 3 when i click the link. If im doing something wrong please let me know. I click on the link that says "create your pbe account" but when i do it takes me back to when i first applied to the pbe on step 2. I cant find a way to create my account so please help.

replies.body: Same issue man {{item:3073}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
same issue here. just got an email still says "application received"
I got the same thing D=
Yeah same problem. Came on here for clarity. Hopefully this gets resolved. Looking forward to playing the new preseason stuff over the weekend

Hey all, 

Your concerns have not fallen upon deaf ears! I've forwarded this issue to the tech team, and hopefully I'll be able to provide an update sometime soon. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RVcEvdjT,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-10-30T03:40:48.632+0000)
>
> Hey all, 
> 
> Your concerns have not fallen upon deaf ears! I've forwarded this issue to the tech team, and hopefully I'll be able to provide an update sometime soon. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

Glad to hear this! I think all of us are just excited that our long wait of finally getting PBE accounts has finally prospered.

Ditto. I think we all know who to blame here...


{{champion:6}} ! You coward! Stop making us suffer because you don't have your rework yet!
Same thing happening here.
This happened to me last night. I tried making my account again an hour later and it worked. Keep trying once in awhile and maybe it'll sort itself out. Good luck!

Hey guys, 

Sorry for the confusion, it looks like the email went out a little earlier than expected and the PBE system had not recognized the new group of approved testers. This should all be resolved by now, thanks for the report everyone!

If anyone is still unable to create an account after receiving an approval email, please be sure to contact us through the [Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) so we can look into it further.
Seems like the problem has resolved. I was able to create my account successfully. See you guys on the Rift! Huge props to Wuks for relaying the message to the tech team.
The problem has been resolved for me. You might wish to retry.
Bump, i submitted a ticket on this same issue :/
I'm having the same issue too ;-;
I am having the same issue. I cleared cookies and tried another browser to no avail. I would love this to be resolved.
Same issue. rip my {{champion:104}}  dreams until this gets fixed.
same problem for me
Oh geez. I literally changed my password because I thought it was a fake e-mail, not letting me continue past that. Good to know. Guess I can wait.. {{summoner:3}}
Same. I was pretty excited when I read the email, but was quickly saddened :c
same here
Ah thank god, I thought i was the only one. Hopefully someone can get back to us soon about it!
Me too. Let's hope some comes and sees this.
saME
Same problem here. :\
Exactly the same problem here {{item:3070}}
Same!
I literally just had the same issue where I got the email, logged in on my account, and still got "pending" on the league website{{champion:63}}
Got the same issue unfortunately.
This just happened to me as well. I am still stuck on Step: 2. :(
Same here! D:
